item.title: Sequent
item.description: A flexible tool for composing and programmatically executing complex sequences of actions

item.description: A ESP8266-based web app and server that uses the Canon CCAPI to trigger a series of exposures over Wi-Fi

item.description: Utility to transform raw James Webb Space Telescope data into viewable color images

item.description: Tool to sync videos from two jointly mounted GoPros using data from multiple sensors

item.description: A notes app built using Flutter with support for offline use and real-time syncing across devices

item.description: Portfolio and blog site created with Hugo SSG, Tailwind CSS, and good old JavaScript

item.description: An automatic time-lapse creation and posting system (my first Python project)

item.description: Visualizing midi files as a chorus of colorful lines using Tone.js and the canvas

item.description: Using feedback loops and interpolation artifacts to get a color palette for a point in an image
